data.title: Cisco Systems company profile
data.meta_description: In 2023 the revenue of Cisco Systems grew by 10.6%, reaching an all-time high. The company engages in the sector 'Communication Equipment'.
data.text:
All companiesCisco Systems

Cisco Systems

Cisco Systems was founded in 1984 and operates in San Jose, United States. The company engages in the sector 'Communication Equipment' (ISIC: 2630). The computer and electronic manufacturing industry is experiencing a period of growth thanks to an uptick in demand. This greater interest in electronics among consumers can be attributed to an increase in domestic income as well as the industry's new products and low prices.
